ygData.subject: Re: A wizards message board?
ygData.msgSnippet: YES!!!!! great idea! ... From: Paul McClung [mailto:p.e.mcclung@larc.nasa.gov] Sent: Wednesday, April 21, 1999 8:08 AM To: eq_wizards@onelist.com Subject:
ygData.messageBody:
YES!!!!!

great idea!

-----Original Message-----
From: Paul McClung [mailto:p.e.mcclung@...]
Sent: Wednesday, April 21, 1999 8:08 AM
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
Subject: [eq_wizards] A wizards message board?


From: Paul McClung <p.e.mcclung@...>

There seems to be enough people to participate in this, would everyone like
me to setup a wizards message board? Then all the email boxes can breathe
easy? And we can still ask all the questions we want?


It would just be a simple board, using WWWBoard or something like that.

- Paul
